definition: sigma (Greek letter Σσ)/(symbol for standard deviation in statistics)
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Once we eliminated the idea that we were converting to Six Sigma, there was much more acceptance of it.
sentences.chinese: 一旦屏棄採用六西格瑪策略，我們更容易接受它。

sentences.english: How to build up LSS leadership influence to executives?
sentences.chinese: 如何培養對管理層的精益六西格瑪領導力影響？

sentences.english: The Six Sigma Black Belt will be able to conduct simple and multiple linear regression.
sentences.chinese: 六西格瑪黑帶能進行單重或多重線性迴歸。

sentences.english: He knew that his apprehension was in part due to his lack of knowledge of Six Sigma.
sentences.chinese: 他知道他的憂慮部分原因是對六西格瑪原則的不瞭解。

sentences.english: The Six Sigma Black Belt should be able to read values from a cumulative frequency ogive.
sentences.chinese: 六西格瑪黑帶應該能夠從累計頻次分佈中讀出數值。

sentences.english: CSSBB Participants must register with ASQ headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 參加認證的六西格瑪黑帶必須經過ASQ總部的註冊。

sentences.english: PPM, DPMO, DPU, RTY, COPQ) to drive enterprise decisions.
sentences.chinese: 管理驅動企業決策的西格瑪績效度量的使用。

sentences.english: The Six Sigma Black Belt will demonstrate the ability to read a fault tree.
sentences.chinese: 六西格瑪黑帶應能示範其理解故障樹分析的能力。

sentences.english: Characteristics and critical to triumph characteristics of six sigma management are expatiated .
sentences.chinese: 介紹了六西格瑪管理的特徵以及成功關鍵要素。

sentences.english: This is an automatic scan SIGMA computer.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個自動掃描西格瑪計算機。

sentences.english: The Six Sigma Black Belt will be able to state the direction of steepest ascent from experimental data.
sentences.chinese: 西格瑪黑帶應能根據實驗數據說出最快上升的方向。

sentences.english: The Six Sigma Black Belt will demonstrate the ability to read a FMEA analysis.
sentences.chinese: 六西格瑪黑帶能示範其理解FMEA分析的能力。

sentences.english: Learn how to improve your small business by implementing Six Sigma problem-solving methods.
sentences.chinese: 學習通過執行六西格瑪問題求解方法改善小公司。

sentences.english: The Six Sigma Black Belt should understand the concepts of randomization and blocking.
sentences.chinese: 六西格瑪黑帶應該理解隨機化和分塊的概念。

sentences.english: Additionally, another advantage of Lean Sigma is the combination of the Kaizen mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 再者，精益西格瑪是各種改善方法的整合。

sentences.english: To supervise and promote six sigma program and meet the goals.
sentences.chinese: 監督和促進六個西格瑪的進程以達到目標。
